level.heading: MEDICAID PROGRAM AND RECIPIENTS HELD HARMLESS (ยง 29-5412)

level.text: Each fee-for-service primary care provider shall hold harmless the District government, the Department and AFDC or AFDC-related Medicaid recipients against any loss, damage, expense and liability of any kind that arises from any action of the provider in the performance of the Medicaid managed care provider agreement.
